author: James Gottry
title: Pro-Life Centers Have Free Speech, Too
text:
The U.S. Supreme Court hears oral arguments Tuesday in a case about pro-life pregnancy centers. Abortion is a politically charged subject, but National Institute of Family and Life Advocates (Nifla) v. Becerra is a case about free speech—specifically, California’s attempt to compel Nifla and other operators of such centers to provide free advertising for abortion providers.
Does the government have the power to force Americans to violate their consciences by expressing messages that they consider objectionable? To date, the...
